author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Gear (Key Chains/Star Wars) - Darth Vader Key Chain Review
review:
I don't really remember it exactly but I think it's my first key chain which is based on the LEGO Star Wars theme. It's a really cool minifig to have as a key chain but the only problems I have with those is that you're not able to take off the legs, the head or the headgear.

Pros

  • Minifig looks cool

Cons

  • Legs, head and/or headgear don't come off

Summary

All in all it's a great set to get and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.
